titleStmt.title: To the Honourable Assembly of the Commons House of Parliament, the humble petition of all and every the inhabitants of the town of Old Braintford in the County of Middlesex
titleStmt.author: Elsynge, Henry, 1598-1654.
England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
